go_data.justification: c-IAP1 was shown to inhibit the apoptosis triggered by IL-1beta converting enzyme overexpression or serum deprivation.
c-IAP1 is recruited to the TNFR2 signaling complex by their interaction with TRAFs.
No explicit information, but based on the provided text, c-IAP1 interacts with TRAFs which are typically found in the cytoplasm.
